mapper.insert: INSERT INTO API_METHOD_PARAM( ID, METHOD_ID, PARAM_NAME, PARAM_TYPE, IS_NECESSARY, EXAMPLE, DEFAULT_VALUE, PARAM_DESCRIPTION, PARAM_CLASS, IS_OBJECT, CREATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{methodId}, #{paramName}, #{paramType}, #{isNecessary}, #{example}, #{defaultValue}, #{paramDescription}, #{paramClass}, #{isObject}, #{createTime} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE API_METHOD_PARAM
METHOD_ID = #{methodId},
PARAM_NAME = #{paramName},
PARAM_TYPE = #{paramType},
IS_NECESSARY = #{isNecessary},
EXAMPLE = #{example},
DEFAULT_VALUE = #{defaultValue},
PARAM_DESCRIPTION = #{paramDescription},
PARAM_CLASS = #{paramClass},
IS_OBJECT = #{isObject},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime}
WHERE ID = #{id}
